Method Detail

getValue

public double getValue(Configuration configuration)
Default fitness for TSP algorithm.

Returns positive number if configuration is solution, number equals maxDistance-tourDistance.

If configuration is not solution, returns negative tourDistance.

Specified by:
getValue in interface Fitness
Parameters:
configuration - attributes to compute fitness
Returns:
fitness of attributes
